title: Villager_Dialog
body:
Can I help you?
[[No, sorry for bothering...|exit]]
[[Yeah! What can I buy here?|op2]]

title: op2
body:
You can buy a lot. What are you looking for?
[[Tools.|tools]]
[[Items.|items]]
[[Nevermind.|exit]]

title: tools
body:
Ah, well i have much to choose from! Have a look!
[[Iron Sword - 1 Diamond|ironsword]]
[[Iron Pickaxe - 2 Diamonds|ironpickaxe]]
[[Iron Axe - 1 Diamond|ironaxe]]
[[Iron Shovel - 1 Diamond|ironshovel]]
[[Nevermind|exit]]

title: items
body:
What kind of item are you looking for?
[[Food.|food]]
[[Potions.|pots]]
[[Nevermind.|exit]]

title: ironsword
body: Here you go! Pleasure doing business with you!

title: ironpickaxe
body: Here you go! Pleasure doing business with you!

title: ironaxe
body: Here you go! Pleasure doing business with you!

title: ironshovel
body:
Here you go! Pleasure doing business with you!
[[tools]]

title: food
body:
Take a look at my wares.
[[20 Carrots - 1 Diamond|carrot]]
[[20 Potatoes - 1 Diamond|potat]]
[[5 Steak - 1 Diamond|beef]]
[[Nevermind.|exit]]

title: pots
body:
Looking for magically items ey? Take a look at my collection!
[[Healing Potion - 2 Diamonds]]
[[Strength Potion - 3 Diamonds]]
[[Nevermind|exit]]

title: carrot
body:
Here you go! Pleasure doing business with you!
<<buy|carrot|20|diamond|1>>

title: potat
body:
Here you go! Pleasure doing business with you!
<<command|give @s baked_potato{display:{Name:'{"text":"super potato","color":"yellow","underlined":true}'},AttributeModifiers:[{AttributeName:"generic.max_health",Name:"generic.max_health",Amount:40,Operation:0,UUID:[I;650526582,144984744,-1311940110,304982183]}]} 5>>

title: beef
body:
Here you go! Pleasure doing business with you!
<<give|cooked_beef|4>>

title: Healing Potion - 2 Diamonds
body: Here you go! Pleasure doing business with you!

title: Strength Potion - 3 Diamonds
body: Here you go! Pleasure doing business with you!

title: exit
body:
Oh, have a good day then.
<<end>>
